For it will be that as <S%H5074>wandering<s%> <S%H5775>birds,<s%> as a <S%H7971>scattered<s%> <S%H7064>nest,<s%> so will the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> be at the <S%H4569>fords<s%> of the <S%H769>Arnon.<s%>

Let my <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> <S%H1481>dwell<s%> with <S%H4124>you!<s%> As for Moab, <S%H1933>be<s%> a <S%H5643>hiding<s%> place for him from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H7703>destroyer.<s%> For the <S%H4160>extortioner<s%> is brought to <S%H656>nothing.<s%> <S%H7701>Destruction<s%> <S%H3615>ceases.<s%> The <S%H7429>oppressors<s%> are <S%H8552>consumed<s%> out of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> that he is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1341>proud;<s%> even of his <S%H1347>arrogance,<s%> his <S%H1347>pride,<s%> and his <S%H5678>wrath.<s%> His boastings are <S%H907>nothing.<s%>

Therefore <S%H4124>Moab<s%> will <S%H3213>wail<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab.<s%> Everyone will <S%H3213>wail.<s%> You will <S%H1897>mourn<s%> for the raisin <S%H808>cakes<s%> of Kir <S%H7025>Hareseth,<s%> utterly <S%H5218>stricken.<s%>

For the <S%H7709>fields<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> <S%H535>languish<s%> with the <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H7643>Sibmah.<s%> The <S%H1167>lords<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> have broken <S%H1986>down<s%> its choice <S%H8291>branches,<s%> which <S%H5060>reached<s%> even to <S%H3270>Jazer,<s%> which <S%H8582>wandered<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%> Its <S%H7976>shoots<s%> were spread <S%H5203>abroad.<s%> They passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

<S%H8057>Gladness<s%> is taken <S%H622>away,<s%> and <S%H1524>joy<s%> out of the fruitful <S%H3759>field;<s%> and in the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> there will be no <S%H7442>singing,<s%> neither joyful <S%H7321>noise.<s%> Nobody will <S%H1869>tread<s%> <S%H1869>out<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> in the <S%H3342>presses.<s%> I have made the <S%H1959>shouting<s%> <S%H7673>stop.<s%>
Therefore my <S%H4578>heart<s%> <S%H1993>sounds<s%> like a <S%H3658>harp<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and my inward <S%H7130>parts<s%> for Kir <S%H7025>Heres.<s%>

It will happen that when <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H7200>presents<s%> <S%H3811>himself,<s%> when he wearies himself on the high <S%H1116>place,<s%> and <S%H935>comes<s%> to his <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> to <S%H6419>pray,<s%> that he will not <S%H3201>prevail.<s%>
This is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> concerning <S%H4124>Moab<s%> in time <S%H227>past.<s%>

But now <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> as a worker bound by <S%H7916>contract<s%> would <S%H8141>count<s%> <S%H3519>them,<s%> the glory of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall be brought into <S%H7034>contempt,<s%> with all his <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude;<s%> and the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> will be <S%H4592>very<s%> <S%H4213>small<s%> and <S%H3808>feeble.<s%>"
